battle

> summary
		team a
			a1		[==================================================]
		team b
			b1		[==================================================]

> a1 attacked

> summary
		team a
			a1		[==================================================]
		team b
			b1		[========================================          ]

> a1 attacked

> summary
		team a
			a1		[==================================================]
		team b
			b1		[==============================                    ]

> b1 attacked

> summary
		team a
			a1		[==============================                    ]
		team b
			b1		[==============================                    ]

> a1 attacked

> summary
		team a
			a1		[==============================                    ]
		team b
			b1		[====================                              ]

> a1 attacked

> summary
		team a
			a1		[==============================                    ]
		team b
			b1		[==========                                        ]

> b1 attacked

> summary
		team a
			a1		[==========                                        ]
		team b
			b1		[==========                                        ]

> a1 attacked

> summary
		team a
			a1		[==========                                        ]
		team b
			b1		[                                                  ]

> team a wins
